item.description:
Walk to Cure Cancer

Please offer a helping hand! We've been asked to photograph this event and share our images with the Organization... just like last year. You can see some of the members images from last years event at http://www.walktocure... You'll be asked to give us a cd of your images from the day...Here are the details!

This year's event...

Sunday, September 26, 2010

UMass Medical School
55 Lake Avenue North, Worcester, MA

Registration: 10 a.m. * Walk: 12 p.m. * Rain or Shine

Registration: 10am-Noon There is an Entrance off of Plantation Street as well....
The Walk to Cure Cancer consists of a five mile loop around Lake Quinsigamond in Worcester, MA. A one-mile route is also optional. Several water stops and rest areas are available around the route. Course monitors are placed throughout the five miles, directing and motivating walkers!

The Walk to Cure Cancer is the largest, single-day fundraising event in Central Massachusetts benefitting the UMass Memorial Cancer Center at the University of Massachusetts Medical School. Funds raised support cutting-edge research and wide-ranging preventive and behavioral studies to provide advanced cancer care to oncology patients. The center integrates some of the most vital cancer research and treatment activities available today The Center encourages innovative collaborations and actively promotes the development of projects dedicated to bringing the work of the bench to the bedside.

To date, the five mile walk-a-thon has raised over $6 million enabling cutting edge cancer research, bringing us one step closer to finding a cure.

We'll need folks to photograph teams again this year- is anyone interested in doing this? They looked like this last year:
http://www.walktocure...

I hope you'll come out and join us for this amazing event!

Cheers,
Donna and Scott

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: We need Photographers to Volunteer for the UMASS Cancer Walk
